mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, C.USER_NO, U.NICKNAME, C.CONTENT, C.IS_DEL, C.PARENT_COMMENT_NO, PU.NICKNAME AS PARENT_NICKNAME, C.CREATED_DATE FROM COMMENT C JOIN USER U ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO LEFT JOIN COMMENT PC ON C.PARENT_COMMENT_NO = PC.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN USER PU ON PC.USER_NO = PU.USER_NO WHERE C.LOG_NO = #{logNo} ORDER BY COALESCE(C.PARENT_COMMENT_NO, C.COMMENT_NO), CASE WHEN C.PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, C.CREATED_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{content} WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
UPDATE COMMENT SET IS_DEL=1 WHERE COMMENT_NO=#{commentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT(USER_NO, LOG_NO, CONTENT, PARENT_COMMENT_NO,CREATED_DATE) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{logNo}, #{content}, #{parentCommentNo}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT NICKNAME FROM USER U JOIN COMMENT C ON U.USER_NO=C.USER_NO WHERE COMMENT_NO=#{parentCommentNo}
